imdb.plot outline: Evangeline De'Salle is the vindictive, snobbish and glamorous magnate of famous haute-couture fashion house - Haus of De'Salle, specialists in fur. From the Siberian Tiger Gilet to the Fur Burka made from Wombles, Evangeline reigns supreme in the fashion world. But one day, a violent anti-fur movement exposes Evangeline for the criminal she is and the Haus of De'Salle falls to wrack and ruin. However, habits cannot be broken and Evangeline hatches a villainous plot to hunt humans instead. Humans with one defining feature - GINGER HAIR. After all, no one would notice - Scientists are saying redheads are under threat (and could become extinct) as a result of global warming. Yes, really. A ginger-twist on the famous 101 Dalmatians story. A Mighty Fine Production for Channel 4 Comedy Blaps.
imdb.title: Filcher & Crook
